text: This is affordable living and the perfect sized house to live comfortably. New vinyl flooring, roof and furnace. You have the added benefit of heating with wood, should you not want to use the oil furnace. This woodstove could easily be your one and only source of heat! Get it before it's gone!

Discover the perfect starter home in a peaceful neighborhood, offering three bedrooms on a beautifully landscaped lot. This charming raised ranch boasts hardwood floors throughout, a bright solarium, and a spacious two-car garage, features that make it truly special. Inside, you'll find an inviting open floor plan with a separate kitchen that could easily be opened up for an even more expansive living experience. The solarium is perfect for enjoying your morning coffee, cultivating an indoor garden, or unwinding year-round. The lower level features a welcoming family room filled with natural light, offering the perfect space for relaxing, entertaining, home office or playroom. Outside, the backyard provides a serene retreat with ample shade, ideal for outdoor entertaining or play. Located conveniently close to local schools, shopping, dining, and entertainment, this home offers both comfort and accessibility. Don???t miss out on this incredible opportunity!

Come see this Charming nine-room, three-bedroom, two-bathroom home! This classic Vermont home offers timeless appeal and modern updates. The inviting living room features a cozy fireplace with a glass-tiled brick hearth, perfect for those chilly New England evenings. Throughout the home, youll find gleaming hardwood floors, adding warmth and character to each space. The formal dining room boasts a built-in china cabinet, offering both elegance and functionality. The spacious kitchen includes a portable island, and there is a full basement with washer and dryer for added convenience. Step outside to enjoy the private backyard oasis, complete with a productive peach tree and apple tree, plus plenty of wood storage for those winter fires. Recent upgrades include a new roof (2020), a freshly paved driveway (2016), and a brand-new water heater (2023). With its classic charm, modern updates, and convenient location, this home is a must-see for anyone looking to settle in the vibrant town of Brattleboro. Dont miss the opportunity to make 322 Putney Road your next home.

Motivated Sellers! Enjoy year-round comfort in this stunning Net Zero home, built in 2012 to meet the rigorous Passive House standard. You wont pay a cent to heat and cool this all-electric house or even charge your EV. Gorgeous woodwork, soaring ceilings, and premium finishes make this light-filled sustainable home a rare find. With superinsulated walls, triple-glazed tilt-turn windows, ducted air exchange with heat recovery, two mini-split heat pumps, a huge solar array, and two Tesla Powerwalls for multiple days of backup power, youll wonder why every house isnt built this way. Spacious kitchen with cherry cabinets, granite counters, Bosch induction cooktop, and a Miele dishwasher, plus a breakfast bar and pass-thru window. The newly-built 1st-floor bedroom suite boasts a walk-in closet and private bathroom with double vanity, curbless shower, quartz countertop, and marble accents. Three more bedrooms upstairs (including another en-suite), plus office space and a sunny indoor garden deck. Surrounded by trees in the perfect Vermont location, near the top of a quiet cul-de-sac but less than 10 min from downtown Brattleboro--home to a vibrant arts community and one of the regions best farmers markets. A short distance to Hilltop Montessori School and mere steps to wooded trails for hiking, snowshoeing, and backcountry skiing. Downhill skiers can reach Mt. Snow in 40 min or Stratton and Okemo in under an hour.

Moonlight Lane...could there ever be a better address? Moonlight in Vermont....just what you dream of when you see the big night sky and the full moon rising, such a Vermont attitude that slides right into morning! Only 2 homes claim this address, this cozy corner of the world. Nestled on 10 acres and surrounded by even larger parcels, this home has the perfect setting at the edge of a lovely, level meadow...mow as much yard as you like...sporting a much loved inground pool, fruit trees, berry bushes, and 2 sets of solar panels.....a small barn for storage, and lots more! Built for the owners 23 years ago, they made great choices in the huge main bedroom, farmer's porch and an open concept perfect for entertaining. The location is a bonus! A blink to Hilltop Montessori, downtown, hospital, shopping but totally country! First time ever on the market...picture this as your last home, your forever home.

Don't miss this condo! Great location and convenient to downtown. The amenities offered by this condominium community are an in-ground pool, tennis and pickleball courts, a basketball court, hiking trails, little libraries and lovely gardens will make condo owning enjoyable. Almost everything in this immaculate stylish condo is only a couple of years old. Not only is most of this condo updated, but the improvements were done with care and in good taste. Added assets include built-in shelving in the living room. Talk about easy living! No outside maintenance or shoveling to be had. Showings begin Saturday, March 15th from 11am-1pm.

Welcome to this 1920's charmer, a perfect blend of classic Craftsman style and modern comfort! Nestled on highly coveted Tyler Street, this 4-bedroom, 1.5-bath gem offers a warm and inviting atmosphere with all the conveniences of today. As you approach, you'll be greeted by a huge covered front porchan ideal spot for enjoying your morning coffee or relaxing in the evening. Step inside to discover beautiful hardwood floors that flow throughout the home, highlighting the timeless craftsmanship. The light-filled kitchen complete with a wonderful pantry opens to a generously sized dining room. The front to back living room with fireplace offers ample space for gatherings and creating cherished memories. Upstairs there are four spacious bedrooms and a fully remodeled bathroom. Recent updates include new windows, central air and updated electrical ensuring comfort and energy efficiency. The partially fenced yard offers manageable outdoor space for gardening or play, with room for creativity to make it your own private oasis. This great in town location assures you are close to shopping, dining, recreation and entertainment, all while savoring the tranquility of a well-established neighborhood.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Easy living with a great location, you can walk downtown or even the train station! There's good space inside with nice sized bedrooms, second floor laundry as well as patio space out back looking out on the woods. Association amenities include a tennis court and in ground pool as well as trash removal, plowing and landscaping. This almost an end unit includes a carport to keep the snow and sun off your vehicle!

Nice location on Western Avenue, sitting up above the road, on an open lot. There is ample parking and the side yard has a sitting area and garden space. This home has the added benefit of an additional 2 bdrm apartment. You can access it through a secret door in the main house, or it does of course have it's own exterior entrance. Enjoy the rental income or open it up for a really large, single family home. Enter the main house through the entryway hall and into the mudroom. Some of the nice features in this home are the walk-in pantry, period natural woodwork, gorgeous maple flooring, built-ins and tasteful and fun light fixtures throughout! You'll want to spend all your time in the all-season sunroom/office. Gorgeous stairs leads you up to the second floor that could have four bedrooms, or three bedrooms with two bonus rooms. The apt has two bedrooms and a large dining/living space. Heat and electric are separated. You will love your short walk to the Farmers Market, Memorial Park and easy access to Interstate 91. A nice place to call home with lots of possibilities!

SUPERB OPPORTUNITY to acquire a solid, small-scale investment property, long-held by local owner/managers. First time offered in nearly 50 years!! This Victorian-era property retains much of its historic charm with hardwood flooring, large rooms, natural woodwork, high ceilings, and fireplaces in two of the four residences. Conveniently located across from the Brattleboro Common on Putney Road in Brattleboro, Vermont, this sweet 4-unit property offers a remarkably private living layout not often seen in a multi-family. There is also a substantial, level, off-street parking area for building residents and visitors. Proximate to downtown Brattleboro, and very close to the library, post office, and shopping. A perfect owner-occupied investment opportunity, OR a pure investment play! Private showings on request.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Majestic, in-town, brick colonial. Tastefully renovated - ALL (3) BRs, offering en-suite BAs. Elegant 18x13 kitchen w/island, S.S. appliances, & tons of cabinetry w/etched glass faces. Primary level w/9-ft ceilings. Nicely landscaped yard w/ priv. fenced-in terrace & parking areas. Enter via enclosed porch, into spacious foyer, where access flows gracefully to every corner of the home. Beautiful hardwood flooring in foyer, kitchen & expansive LR. LR offers fireplace w/ period mantle, paneling surround & side cabinets. Large windows, attractive 6/1 sash (mostly), providing natural light throughout. 1st FL laundry off rear entrance perfect for every day, owner access & convenience. BA, DR & sunroom/office (w/ slider to south deck) round out 1st FL. 2nd FL accessed by gentle, -turn staircase opening onto a generous 9x7 landing area; perfect for small reading nook or childs play area. Each of the three spacious BRs offers an en-suite BA & closet spaces. The primary BR has a full BA & huge walk-in closet/dressing room. The other two BRs each offer comfortable -BAs. One of these two BRs offers a balcony facing west. Full basement offering plenty of ceiling height for use with hobbies or fitness. Convenient, in-town location w/ easy access to downtown library, banks, shopping, co-op and Amtrak. Close to hospital, golf, trails & I-91. Fantastic get-away property or family residence.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: This charming home, ordered initially from a Sears catalog and delivered by train to Brattleboro, was assembled at its current location in 1930. It's an ideal residence for a young couple starting or an older couple seeking single-level living. Situated at the corner of Spruce Street and Ginkgo Lane, the neighborhood is perfect for evening strolls and is close to the retreat trailhead. You'll have easy access to all the area offers just around the corner from the BOC and minutes from downtown. The home is cozy yet spacious, featuring a delightful office space with custom built-ins. Its truly a lovely home in a fantastic location. Closing is scheduled for January 2025. One of the sellers is a licensed Realtor.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: GREAT OPPORTUNIY TO OWN THIS CONDO WITH A PRICE REDUCTION! This endearing, loveable, one-bedroom, one-bath condo in the desirable Bluebell building, designed for 55 and older offers an inviting open-concept kitchen, dining, and living area. This home has new carpet throughout and the bedroom is tremendous with a fabulous walk-in closet and a convenient laundry room off the hallway. Located on the quiet second floor with no one above you, this unit can be accessed by both elevator and stairs. The covered deck is south facing bringing so much sunshine into your home. Arbor hill offers shared gathering rooms, lovely, landscaped gardens and plenty of room for additional storage. Centrally located, close to downtown, and quick access to I91. A lot to love about this sweet home!

Come home to this meticulously maintained home. Upstairs boasts an open concept Kitchen/dining/living space, with beautiful Oak flooring. Down the hall, 2 bedrooms share a full bath with dual sinks. In addition, the primary bedroom has an en suite 3/4 bath. The finished lower level has a large rec room with a newer 3 zone on demand hot water heating system and direct entrance to the oversized 1 car garage, equipped with a smart opener. Outside enjoy privacy on a new pressure treated deck. Your view from the front of the property remains Green, with town land being used as a meadow with a nearby community garden. Within walking distance to school, shopping and town transportation. Come enjoy the easy living of this in-town home!

There just aren't many in-town building lots these days. This level and open lot is in a great neighborhood, with the hospital and shopping very near by. Town water and town sewer and electric service are all available at the street. This is a perfect spot to build your new home, or maybe have a tiny house put in place.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: WOW! In town level, partially fenced, wide open, ready to build! Town water and sewer at the curb. Plenty of room to build and have a sweet yard just right for gardening, play or just a nap in the hammock. In the heart of hospital, grocery stores, schools, and a minute or two from I91 for work or fun travel. Check with the zoning folks for guidance on what you can build, but start now and be in for spring!

This beautifully maintained single-family home offers both comfort and practical living in a charming Brattleboro neighborhood. This inviting residence features four spacious bedrooms and two full well-appointed bathrooms that abounds with natural light and creates an inviting and charming atmosphere throughout. The spacious yard includes a German Hugelkultur raised bed garden, blueberry and raspberry bushes. Heirloom sweetpea blossoms, and poppies adorn the boundaries The living areas showcase quality hardwood floors and the spacious kitchen has a great pantry space attached. A bonus room offers the option for home office, gym, studio, or second living room. A classic New England front porch extends the living space outdoors, offering the perfect spot to relax and enjoy quiet moments or greet friendly neighbors. In addition, a unique barnideal for storageadds a touch of rustic charm while meeting your practical needs. All major systems have been diligently maintained and updated to ensure efficient performance and peace of mind for years to come. Ideally located near downtown shops, restaurants, hospital, schools, and the Brattleboro Co-Op. Showings are delayed until Saturday March 15th

A unique opportunity in West Brattleboro Village: this level building lot features a spacious paved parking area and has frontage on both Western Ave and Glen St. The Village Center Zoning allows for various potential uses, making it ideal for a mixed-use development such as multi-family housing, professional offices, or a business. It can also be purchased alongside the neighboring 2-apartment home, which includes a detached barn/garage that could be converted into a studio or additional living space. Refer to MLS 5013592 for more details.

This vintage home is as convenient as it gets! This nicely situated cape on a corner lot with approximately 1400 square feet of living space, four bedrooms, two full baths, vinyl siding, slate roof and generous room proportions make in town living easy. The master bedroom on the second floor has its own private bath, with two other bedrooms located on the second floor. Generous proportioned dining and living room add to the cozy and comfortable feeling of this home. Located within about a half mile of downtown, grocery stores, shopping and the hospital. If you don't drive that's not a problem as the public bus stop is immediately accessible. A tremendous opportunity to call this house your home! Home is being sold as is.
broker_name: Better Homes & Gardens The Masiello Group
office_name: Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group

text: Beautiful move-in-ready end unit! This Brattleboro townhouse offers convenience and accessibility in a lovely community with a tennis court, in-ground swimming pool, and dedicated carport (with a hanging space for canoes and kayaks should you feel the call of the nearby Connecticut River). The spacious living room, dine-in kitchen, and 2 bedrooms can play host to many lifestyles: whether you're just starting out, newly retired, or trying to find a good home base to support nearby work, it's easy to appreciate the benefits of a well-maintained home in a small community where exterior maintenance is handled on your behalf. The private deck, mini-split AC unit, and bedroom walk-in closet are all nice features to have included in this well-lit second-floor unit. Open House to be held Sunday, April 6th from 11:00AM to 2:00PM.

Double the Value! This unique listing includes two deeded properties in a bright and convenient area of town. Available for the first time in over thirty years, this stunning colonial offers a tranquil escape from city life, just minutes from downtown amenities. With its timeless elegance and classic charm, the home is flooded with natural light, particularly on the sun porch, which provides a lovely spot to relax and enjoy views of the lush, private gardens. Cozy up by the fireplace on winter evenings for warmth and comfort. The expansive first floor features a seamless flow with a private office and a beautifully appointed libraryperfect for work and leisure. Upstairs, youll find four spacious bedrooms, two of which are en-suite, each with unique character. An attached two-car garage adds convenience, while a separate guest house/ADU at the rear of the property offers excellent options for extended family living or rental income. This distinctive property can be the perfect home for years with some updating. Located just 2 hours from Boston and 3.5 hours from NYC, this ideal retreat combines tranquility with urban proximity. Dont miss out on this rare opportunity!
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Check out this 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home in Southern Vermont. This house has town water and sewer as well as high speed internet available. The house does needs work, but would make a great winter project. The location could also be a great spot for a professional office, but you would need to discuss what options are available with town.

From the moment you step inside, youll be captivated by the timeless beauty of this home. An inviting foyer welcomes you, leading to an elegant, curved staircase that ascends to the second floorshowcasing craftsmanship that would be nearly impossible to replicate today. The homes original woodwork, plaster, lathe walls, wood trim, and doors are so well preserved that they appear as though they were just completed despite being 120 years old. This home exudes a quiet, enduring charm that is rare to find. Over two decades, the owners have expertly restored the property, blending its historic character with modern amenities, including a chefs kitchen featuring granite countertops and a large island. Beyond the kitchen, a charming built-in china cabinet highlights the expansive dining room. The spacious living room impresses with a coffered ceiling and a wood stove. Adjacent to the living room, a generous three-season enclosed porch offers serene backyard views, with established raised bed gardens featuring asparagus and raspberry plantings. Upstairs, there are four charming bedrooms and two well-appointed bathrooms. The finished third floor offers even more versatility, with a spacious bedroom and lots of space, now used as a music studio and office. There is Fidium fiber installed in the house for high speed internet. A home combining historic allure with modern convenience, all just minutes from downtown and its many offerings. It's a unique offering.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Sunny South-Facing End Unit Townhome with Land in Brattleboro, VT. Enjoy the perfect blend of privacy, natural light, and convenience with this unique south-facing end unit townhome. This home is one of three townhomes that share a common wall, has its own land and no HOA fees. Located just minutes from downtown, the Farmers Market and other community events. Versatile! This light filled, well cared for home has ample living and storage space with a first floor bonus room that you could use as a bedroom, office or media room. Open concept living room, dining room & kitchen with first floor half bathroom & pantry. The second floor has 2 bedrooms and a full bathroom. If organizing is your thing you will love the custom organizing systems in each closet. Recent updates include a newer roof, windows, and an efficient Buderus hot water tank. The large, dry basement provides plenty of additional storage space. Step outside to enjoy the pops of color in the established flower beds and the large sprawling deck perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests during the warmer months. Whether you're hosting a gathering or simply enjoying your own private space, this home is a delight. If you are looking for a light filled home that you can move right into and is easy to maintain, convenient to downtown yet private with a flexible layout & storage space - this is the one for you.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Close to the park, schools, downtown and trail, this 3+ bedroom, 2 bath home offers a welcoming interior, including hardwood floors, energy efficient windows and period moldings throughout. The covered front porch offers entry to the kitchen, or formal entryway with a lovely staircase. Warmed by a propane stove and complete with bookcases, the living room is a cozy space to relax. View the sloped, wooded backyard at tree-top level from the sunroom off the dining area or entertain on the spacious, private deck off the kitchen. A finished third floor room offers the option of a study or bedroom space. The attached garage and carport provide convenient off-street parking. Laundry area is in the basement, along with room for a work area, and walk out to the rear of the house. The bonus room behind the garage provides space for storage. Circa 1924, 100 years later, this great in-town home still has a lot to offer!
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Well-maintained single-wide mobile home on a double lot in Tri-Park Coop. Fresh paint and new flooring throughout, newer appliances, and new hot water heater. This home has a light-filled living room, spacious eat-in kitchen, and primary bedroom with half-bath and custom barn door. Enjoy the sounds of the brook from the covered porch and large fenced-in yard with space for gardening. There is a shed for additional storage. Buyer must be approved by the park, pass a background check, and purchase one voting share.
broker_name: Better Homes & Gardens The Masiello Group

text: 4 condo units being sold together as a great residential package investment opportunity! Rent them, live in one and/or sell them off individually. This offering includes 4 of 5 units in a charming condo development just minutes from downtown, the hospital, shopping, and I-91. Unit 5 has been sold. Live in one unit and rent the other 3or continue renting all four. The property currently generates approximately $7, 000/month in rental income, and the owner was informed by the town that the lot may support the construction of another home, offering valuable future potential. The property features a large shared yard, off-street parking, and strong rental appeal. All units are fully furnished and currently rented, except one mid-renovation. Unit 1 is a spacious 2BR/1BA with a walk-in pantry, washer/dryer, mudroom, oil heat, and a private side porch. Unit 2 is a cozy 1BR+ with electric heat, walk-in pantry, and small porch. Unit 3, under renovation, is a large 2BR with gas heat, generous living room, and private front porch. Unit 4 is an updated 1BR/1BA in excellent condition. All units include charming period details like clawfoot tubs and porches. A versatile, income-producing property with upside for investors and owner-occupants alike.

Offers due by Monday 4/28 at 3:00 Looking for an affordable home within walking distance to downtown Brattleboro? Come see this 8 room, 3+ bed, 2 full bath home. The 2nd floor has been updated with beautiful refinished floors, recent paint, updated bath and walkup attic with spray foam insulation. The 1st floor needs updates and repairs, but could shine as nicely as the 2nd floor! Replacement windows in all but 4 windows. Picture yourself sitting on the front porch with your favorite beverage of choice! Parking for 2 cars tandem. Private road, no on-street parking. Close to highways and shopping!

Sunlight pours into this beautifully maintained home! If you're looking for a low-maintenance lifestyleno snow shoveling, no exterior upkeepthis is the one for you. Drive directly into your attached garage, which offers extra storage, and enter through a spacious mudroom with even more room to stay organized. The main level features an open-concept kitchen, dining, and living areaperfect for entertaining. A custom counter piece from A Candle in the Night adds a charming, artistic touch. Step through the sliding doors to a sunny, south-facing yard adorned with professionally landscaped flower beds. A convenient half bath is also located on the first floorgreat for guests. A stair lift provides easy access to the second level and is included in the sale. Upstairs, you'll find two generously sized bedrooms with ample closet space and a full bathroom featuring rich Brazilian Cherry floors. The laundry area is also located on this level for your convenience. Bonus perk: The Vermont Country Deli is just across the street! Located near a local park with quick access to the hospital, highways, and shopping, this home is truly a hidden gem. Delayed showings begin Saturday 5/3 with an OPEN HOUSE 11am - 2pm.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: Welcome Home! This move-in-ready gem is a delight, full of character and charm with modern conveniences. As you step inside, you'll find a home bathed in natural sunlight, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The open kitchen and dining area are perfect for entertaining, and the new sliding door opens onto the large back deck, where you can enjoy the spacious, level yardideal for gardening with southern exposure. The first floor also features a convenient half-bath, a versatile bedroom or office, and a classy living room with a cozy fireplace. Upstairs, you'll find the serene primary bedroom with a unique walk-through office space, another spacious bedroom, and a full bathroom complete with a jetted tub and step-in showeryour personal oasis. Recent updates include a new furnace, electric panel, and mini-splits, providing comfort and peace of mind for years to come. The paved driveway and low-maintenance vinyl siding make upkeep a breeze. Conveniently located near public transportation, shopping, I-91, the Farmers Market, and so much more. If you love hitting the slopes, Mount Snow is just about a 25-minute drive, and downtown Brattleboro is less than a few miles away. This home truly has it allschedule your personal showing today!

You choose! This amazing property can be used as one of the grand ladies of the neighborhood...just open a door or two and repurpose the kitchen...what a nice laundry room it would make...or use as is with 2 flats, live in 1 and have a bit of income from the other...What else, you might ask! There is a rear section of the house ready to be reclaimed, and a barn attached that could also be built out as living space!. So...a nice big rambling home or maybe 2 more apartments! And there is more! In the back, out of the way...there is a beautiful 40x40 building for all sorts of uses...storage, workshop, ....perhaps create a bonus room! There is so much to consider you will need to take a bit of extra time to look at this one. Please, respect the tenants, a 48 hour notice and be prepared for shoe removal for the apartments!

Desirable 2 bedroom, 1 bath low maintenance, affordable home. Your spacious living/dining area has sliders looking out to the woods and a small yard space. Upstairs are 2 large bedrooms and a full bath. The lower level is a 465 square foot basement for extra storage with washer/dryer hookup. The entire interior has been freshly painted, new kitchen cabinets, countertop, new flooring, new bathroom vanity, new windows and front door. This condo is located in a prime location with quick, easy access to I91, Farmers Market and Living Memorial Park. Association fees include heat, water/sewer, landscaping and more.

Unique opportunity to invest in your own home and have revenue from 2 apartments. Located close to all that Brattleboro has to offer for unique shopping, art, theater and lots of dining venues. The 1st floor apartment has over 1500 square feet of living space with 2+ bedrooms and two bathrooms, its own covered porch and expansive deck. Additionally, there is a spacious eat in kitchen, large living room with french doors to the formal dining room and laundry room with washer & dryer. The 1st apartment on the 2nd floor is a 1-2 bedroom unit which has a large kitchen, living room with french doors and its own private covered porch. The other 2nd floor apartment is a huge studio with kitchen/dining room and large living/sleeping room. This property has parking for at least 4 vehicles and a new shed that stores up to 4 bicycles. Hiking and biking and boating spots near by. Well maintained property with many improvements including new vinyl siding and fresh paint on the exterior. Excellent tenant history. Make this lovely property your own new home or investment opportunity.

Remodeled adorable Cape in a very sweet neighborhood! Since 2022 the current owner has made so many impressive improvements. The new kitchen is bight and contemporary. Tastefully done with new counter-tops, cabinets, flooring, sink and appliances. The dining room has new floors, paint and a propane heater that opens to the deck and a level yard. The labor of love continues throughout the first floor. The living room is bright with southeast light, 2 bedrooms and lovely bath with new windows and paint throughout. Upstairs is a versatile space, another large bedroom or office and certainly enough space for a potential bath. Besides the new windows there is an abundance of storage. There is a detached one car garage and a new 2024 roof. You cannot beat this quiet, convenient location. Showings start Friday, May 2nd by appointment.

Outstanding Investment Opportunity Near Downtown Brattleboro. Just minutes from the vibrant Brattleboro town center, this versatile two-unit property offers unmatched convenience and strong potential for investors or owner-occupants alike. Enjoy close proximity to shopping, dining, and professional services, as well as Brattleboro Memorial Hospital, local schools, and several parks for year-round outdoor recreation. Each spacious apartment is designed for comfortable living and features private entrances for added privacy, two bedrooms, an eat-in kitchen ideal for everyday meals or entertaining, convenient laundry hookups, and inviting porches that create a welcoming entry and a relaxing outdoor space. Each unit also includes two additional light-filled living areas that offer flexible use as a home office, guest quarters, studio, or hobby room, meeting a wide variety of modern lifestyle needs. Whether you're looking to live in one unit and rent out the other to offset your mortgage or fully lease both units for steady passive income, this property delivers strong rental appeal in a high-demand location. Enjoy the convenience of a roomy driveway that easily fits several cars. With solid bones, classic New England charm, and endless possibilities, this duplex presents a rare chance to build equity and grow your real estate portfolio in one of Vermont's most creative communities.

High cash flow well maintained 4plex located in quaint Brattleboro neighborhood within proximity to the vibrant downtown, listed at a deep-value 11% cap rate. This 100% occupied building has 2x 2br and 2x1br, and a net operating income of ~38K with significant upside based on rents over 20% below market. A new owner can step into to yield over a 15% cash on cash return starting year 1, and build wealth through high cash-flow vs speculation. Rents can be brought to market to achieve north of a 25% cash on cash (see proforma in OM). In addition to enjoying the tremendous cash flow, there is also significant upside to acquire a high quality stabilized 4plex with value-add from growing rents to market, ahead of the investment and resurgence going on in vibrant and desirable Brattleboro. The property is available as a package with other buildings in Brattleboro and in nearby towns for a buyer looking for a larger high cash flow turnkey multifamily portfolio. Listing Broker is a member of the LLC selling the property.

Welcome to 8 Deepwood Dr, Brattleboro, VT 05301, where modern comfort meets affordability in Deepwood MHP Park! This brand-new Dias model manufactured home offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and 869 sq. ft. (14 x 66 ft.) of thoughtfully designed living space. Step inside to an open-concept layout with stylish finishes, a bright living area, and a well-appointed kitchen. The home features energy-efficient construction, modern appliances, and low-maintenance materials, making it perfect for easy living. Located in a peaceful and well-maintained community, this home is ideal for those looking for a move-in-ready option in a convenient location. Dont miss out on this opportunity! Contact us today for more details or to schedule a tour.

Convenient Location & Low Maintenance Living! Enjoy easy access to shopping, public transportation and waterfront with scenic trails. The backyard is just the right size for enjoying nature and a little fresh air. This charming home combines classic character with practical updates featuring a standing seam roof, vinyl windows and aluminum siding. Inside, the home radiates its original charm with beautiful hardwood floors, natural woodwork and timeless character throughout. The spacious first floor offers a bright living room, formal dining room, sun-filled kitchen, a 1/2 bath, laundry and a bonus family room. The former one-car garage was converted to a sensible mudroom. Upstairs you will find 3 comfortable bedrooms, a full bath and a pull-down to access the full attic for storage. Schedule your private showing today.

The cutest house on the block! Only 1 house from the famous deli for eats, right near the entrance to I 91, both north and south for travel or work and 2 minutes away from Memorial Park with all it offers....skating, ball games, pools, sliding, skiing. Plus it has a great back yard, 2 levels of decks and a front porch to add to the package. This 1860's Mansard is so sweet, filled with character and just waiting for a new owner. The current owner rents both units, but probably best suited for owner occupancy in the house and a versatile use for the lower level mother in law (current rent is $575/month). The main house has an open concept letting the light flood the main living area. There is a den...bedroom?...on the first floor for a getaway, and the bedrooms are on the second floor tucking in with those lovely deep set windows. If you love a playful home, would like the help of a bit of income, a convenient location, and a home you can brag about, this is it. 48 hour notice required for respect for tenants

How sweet it is! It is the perfect time to own this home, as the season turns to spring all the extraordinary effort in design and creating the hardscape and gardens come to life in bursts of bloom, enchanting ribbons of perfume and delightful fragrant nooks. Out back, in the private, personal space is the 24x50 salt water pool....once a swim school pool....now an oasis waiting for you to kick back and relax. The home...rich in history.....dates to 1819.....has been lovingly updated, keeping as much character as possible, but with the eye to modern standards of comfort. The main floor has an option for a lovely main bedroom with....just around the corner... a tiled walk in shower and laundry to allow for one floor, aging in place option. The light filled 2nd floor is classic colonial big bedrooms, big windows and 2 huge walk in closets. You will never wonder where to store the linens again! Plan a bit of time for this one. Please be respectful and be prequalified before making showing arrangements.

This single wide has so many added benefits! You can heat entirely with wood should you choose, there's an entryway and a huge heated mudroom, with direct access to the expansive back yard. The corner lot overlooks neighboring grassy fields for additional privacy. This yard has raised beds and over 200 bulbs planted! Being sold with a solar generator that powers the owners' home office. Contingent upon sellers finding suitable housing. You must be 55 or older to live in this Park and Buyer must be Park approved. Ideal closing date would be June 1st. Square footage includes the entryway and mudroom

Marlboro Avenue! A desirable and sunny neighborhood of sweet homes known for its friendliness and truly convenient location. This attractive 3 bedroom, 2 bath home with a fantastic fenced-in yard has many sought-after key features. Current owners have added mini-splits, a huge, enclosed porch- perfect for a mudroom and additional living space. They have renovated the kitchen, including appliances, replaced much of the old flooring with new, renovated the full bath, updated electrical wiring, added some new windows, and much more! The once one-car garage has been converted into a finished 310' beautiful, cozy studio with sleeping/storage loft, mini-split and full bath- perfect for guests, a separate home office space, or potential rental. Back and side yards are enclosed- perfect for pets and play and has a large shed for your tools and mower. Ton of southern exposure means great gardening and sun streaming in your windows. The roof is young, and the home's exterior was just painted. Previous owners had SEVCA insulation work. Basement is dry and partially finished with a second bathroom featuring a deep soaking tub. You cannot go wrong with this property at this location at this great price. Sold AS-IS . Do not hesitate, make your viewing appointment today! SHOWINGS BEGIN: Friday, April 4th.

Charming and well-built Cape-style home featuring 4 bedrooms and 2 full baths. The updated kitchen boasts tiled floors, generous counter space, and modern finishesperfect for the home chef. Just off the kitchen, the dining room includes a sliding door that opens to the backyard and patio, ideal for indoor-outdoor entertaining. Beautiful hardwood floors run throughout the homeno carpet here. The inviting living room offers a classic wood-burning fireplace with an attractive mantel, adding warmth and character. With two bedrooms on the main level and two upstairs, the flexible layout works perfectly for guest rooms, an in-home office, or both. The one-car garage offers direct access to the basement, adding convenience and functionality. Recent upgrades include a paved driveway and a new retaining wall. The high-efficiency Buderus furnace has been recently serviced for peace of mind. Out back, the fully fenced yard offers privacy, lush perennial plantings, and a peaceful setting just minutes from downtown Brattleboro. Enjoy easy access to the hospital, medical offices, shopping, and restaurants. Sale is contingent on the seller securing suitable housing.
broker_name: Better Homes & Gardens The Masiello Group
office_name: Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group

text: This 6-unit fully-leased and cashflowing property is in great condition. With gross rents of $66, 000, expenses (including property taxes) of $14, 538, and net income of $51, 462, this investment property shows a 12.1% cap rate. With stable, long-term tenants on annual leases and fully-separated utilities in 5 of the 6 units, just about everything is taken care of. Built in 1970, the property is modern and easy to maintain. Two spacious 2-bedroom units feature charming hardwood floors, while two 1-bedrooms include beautiful large picture windows and recently-installed mini splits, and two top-floor studios offer a full range of apartment options. Located just minutes away from downtown Brattleboro and all that it has to offer, where rental demand is sky-high, the property hasn't had a vacancy in years. A spacious lot allows for off-street parking for all six tenants, and nearby attractions include hiking trails, the Brattleboro farmers market, and the ski hill. Recent upgrades to the property include new propane furnaces and hot water heaters, insulation and stucco, and new bath fans and vents. At a 12% cap rate with low rents and the potential to add easily installed coin-op laundry in the common area for additional income, this would be fantastic for any investor. Nice turn key building that doesn't need anything to start earning money. See it today.
broker_name: Better Homes & Gardens The Masiello Group
office_name: Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group

text: Everything deserves a second chance, and this home found the right owner to love and recreate it in a stunning new life. Anyone who has looked at this home in the past few years, has to come back to see the shine....the fresh new look....the simplicity of move right in. Not only is this home refreshed stem to stern, it has new windows, siding, shingles, kitchen, bath.....and on and on! Tuck yourself in, create a garden, Barbeque on the private back deck, create a workshop in the basement, just enjoy being in a quiet neighborhood. It is NOT too good to be true...it is too good to miss. Open house Saturday, May 3rd, from 1 pm - 3 pm.

Prime commercial opportunity in the heart of downtown Brattleboro. This mixed-use property features seven residential apartments on the upper levels and five ground-floor commercial units. Two retail spaces have direct frontage on Elliot Street, offering strong visibility, while three others open onto the Harmony Lot pedestrian area, a centrally located public parking and business zone. The building offers a diverse income stream through a combination of residential and commercial tenants. Tenants benefit from proximity to shops, municipal services, public parking, and local transit routes. The property has a consistent rental history and is served by town water and sewer. This is an opportunity to acquire a multi-unit downtown building with established income and future upside potential. Showings by appointment only.

Tucked in a sweet newer neighborhood, this home is not to be missed. Perfect for one floor living and aging in place, but versatile enough for choosing an upstairs bedroom! There is a one car attached garage and sunny deck with a slider to the dining area. The open concept with a vaulted ceiling gives a spacious, light filled living area. Some tlc needed but well worth a painting party. Delayed showings until the open house on Saturday 3/22- 11am-1pm

If youre looking for privacy, space to roam, and the convenience of being just 3 miles from downtown Brattleboro, this charming Cape-style home is a must-see! Set on a beautifully landscaped 1.16-acre lot in a desirable neighborhood, this 3-bedroom, 1.5 bath home sits slightly elevated above the others, offering stunning mountain views and all-day natural sunlight. The open-concept kitchen and family room create a welcoming space for gathering, with great flow and plenty of light. A spacious living room, dining area, and large bedrooms offer flexibility and comfort throughout. The lower level includes oversized daylight windows, roughed-in plumbing for a third bathroom, and a partially finished room ready for your customizationideal for a guest suite, office, or rec room. The property also features a large shed for outdoor equipment, raised garden beds, a patio for entertaining, and great chicken coop! Wildlife lovers will appreciate regular visits from deer, turkeys, and songbirds. Located in a peaceful, rural setting on a paved public road, this well-maintained home is in a sought-after subdivision near schools and public transportation. Whether you're seeking quiet country living or quick access to town amenities, this home offers the best of both worlds. Open House Saturday and Sunday 11am-1pm

High cash flow 100% occupied 8 unit located in downtown Brattleboro. This property was recently renovated and is being listed at a 11% cap and an annual Net Operating Income estimated at north of ~$80K (12% cap without management fees). The property features an attractive mix of unit types and sizes including 4x rarely available oversized 3br, 2x2br and 2x1br A new owner can step into to this turnkey investment, projected to yield a ~19% cash on cash return starting year 1 based on current numbers. This allows an investor to realize returns from cash-flow vs speculation. In addition to enjoying the tremendous cash flow, there is also significant upside to acquire a high quality stabilized 8-plex in the heart of vibrant and growing Brattleboro at an attractive valuation. The property is available as a package with other buildings across VT for a buyer looking for a larger high cash flow turnkey multifamily portfolio. Listing Broker is a member of the LLC selling the property.

Loved and owned by the same family for over 50 years! Very well maintained 1952 Cape with 1 car garage under. This home features first floor bedroom, 2 bedrooms on the second floor. It also has first floor laundry, screen room off the family room, large kitchen and formal living room with fireplace. Two bedrooms and full bath on the second floor round out this wonderful family home. Showings start Saturday (5/17) with an open house from 11:00 to 1:00.

You choose! Such a versatile property...invest in 2 rentals...live in either unit and rent the other...maybe develop the barn into another unit, home business, workshop..(check with Zoning). Just short of an acre (.86) the land is the big, big seller....the huge, mostly level back yard is already lush with flourishing fruit trees and blueberry bushes. There is a garage/gardening shed for your lawn tractor and gardening equipment, or tune it up and give your collectable car a new home. Age in place! Everything you need on the first floor with bed, bath and laundry. Newly renovated, this one sparkles and shines. There are still some touches for the new owner in the warmer weather to complete, but you can move right in, start collecting rent from the 4 room apartment in the rear, range, fridge, w/d included. $850 a month and they pay their utilities. Great for income or generation x interim housing! Apartment shown on 2nd showing and with 48 hour notice. Shoes off, so wear those slip ons.

Charming Traditional New England cape built in 1871 with many upgrades. Located on a lovely cul-de-sac street. Enter through your classic mudroom, with a newly replaced floor, into a fabulous renovated kitchen that has a retro flare with lively yellow tile, & framed black & white tile backsplash. The kitchen is impressive with a nook & granite table & a combination of closed cabinets & open oak shelving. There is a graceful flow from the eat-in kitchen to the formal dining room & then to the spectacular living room. All rooms have over 9-foot ceilings & an abundance of southeastern light. The first floor also has a private laundry room & full bath. Upstairs are four bedrooms with a half bath. A very private, sweet fenced in backyard with a lovely low maintenance garden & a sprinkle of pear trees. There is also an attached garage, & a 21 x 28 barn that can offer endless possibilities. Upgrades to include a renovated kitchen, upgraded electric system, new plumbing, refinished all of the beautiful first-floor hardwood & staircase, insulated second-floor bathroom with ceiling, repairs to roof in 2022, newly rebuilt front porch, replaced stairway & upstairs hall carpet, installed sliding glass shower door, & new electric garage door. This home is close to town conveniences & all our beautiful Brattleboro has to offer. Easy access to I91, close to Boston and New York City. A very charismatic yet practical home. Showings start Saturday, May 10th by appointment.

SWEET! Sitting on 3/4 of an acre of lovely level land, a corner lot and lots of room for gardening and play! There is a 2 car garage (owner is putting on new doors ) that has been a workshop with insulation, electric and was heated....This gentle one way street encourages sitting on the traditional front porch with a good book, or close your eyes, and nap a bit. The sunny side also has a greenhouse porch (with screens) that is just right for pots of posies to brighten your day. Inside you will love the custom kitchen, beautiful wood floors, double fold french doors, lovely large sunny period windows and the so loved farm style floor plan. You will appreciate the front entry hall, waiting to be a cozy nook for a library, display a special piece of furniture, or just the beauty of the period. A great drive by property for a good look at the enormous yard filled with trees, shrubs and flowers and the special corner location. Please be prequalified before requesting a showing. SHOWINGS START AT THE OPEN HOUSE 11-1 ON SATURDAY 5/17/25.

Whether you're seeking a smart investment or a beautifully appointed primary residence, this exceptional offering in the heart of Brattleboro, VT, is not to be missed. Fully renovated by the current owners, this charming home offers far more than it's modest exterior suggests. Step onto the inviting screened porch ??? the perfect spot to unwind during warmer months or transition comfortably from the outdoors during Vermont???s messier seasons. Inside, the entryway is framed by a staircase and a cozy first-floor suite, leading into an open-concept living, dining, and kitchen area. A conveniently located first-floor bath and laundry are positioned near the formal entrance for added ease. Upstairs, you???ll find two additional tastefully designed bedrooms and a luxurious bathroom featuring a soaking tub and a separate shower, offering a spa-like retreat. Outside, the property offers a comfortable yard with a shed that holds potential for upgrades. Across the street, an additional lot provides tranquil access to the Whetstone Brook and ample parking. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood yet just a short walk to town, this home blends serenity with convenience ??? making it an ideal place to call home. Open House on Saturay May 3rd from 1pm-3pm.

Welcome to 8 Reservoir Rd, Brattleboro, VT 05301, where modern comfort meets affordability in Deepwood MHP Park! This brand-new Dias model manufactured home offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and 869 sq. ft. (14 x 66 ft.) of thoughtfully designed living space. Step inside to an open-concept layout with stylish finishes, a bright living area, and a well-appointed kitchen. The home features energy-efficient construction, modern appliances, and low-maintenance materials, making it perfect for easy living. Located in a peaceful and well-maintained community, this home is ideal for those looking for a move-in-ready option in a convenient location. Dont miss out on this opportunity! Contact us today for more details or to schedule a tour.

Step into this beautifully updated Cape style home offering a perfect blend of classic charm and modern updates. Ideally located near the hospital, public transportation, shopping and more, providing both convenience and comfort in an ideal location. From the moment you enter, youll be greeted by the warm inviting ambiance, fall in love with the stunning wood flooring and rich natural woodwork throughout. All new windows provide energy efficiency, and flood the home with natural sunlight. The first floor boasts a spacious living room, central dining area, sweet kitchen with all new appliances, large bedroom, laundry and a gorgeous updated bathroom featuring a beautifully tiled, oversize step-in shower. Additionally, there is a large bonus room perfect for a studio, family room or whatever suits your needs. Upstairs, youll find two well-appointed bedrooms, one includes an en-suite 1/2 bath and a very large walk-in closet. Outside, enjoy a spacious carport, paved driveway and tastefully, landscaped fenced in backyard. Choose your perfect spot to relax, the front screened-in porch or enclosed back porch, both are perfect for enjoying the warm evenings or sipping your morning coffee. This exquisite home in a very desirable neighborhood is clearly loved and very well maintained.

Spring Price Reduction! 3 One bedroom units and 4 single room occupancy units (SROs) w a shared bathroom and dishwashing area. Newer shingle roof on rear addition. The unfinished basement is spray foam insulated with a vapor barrier. Recent fire and safety inspection. Building needs a hands-on owner willing to take on some maintenance and improvements. Solid returns with opportunity to enhance with some improvements and separately metering heating to individual units. Fully rented. Low turnover with mostly longer term tenants in place.

text: What a great place to invest or owner occupy. Great neighborhood across from the Oak Grove School. Great income, with a lot of improvements and respectful tenants already in place. Perfect for owner occupied, with a 3 bedroom/2 bath first floor apartment. Corner lot with plenty of parking, some gardening space and easy access to I91 or downtown. Please be respectful and 48 hour notice to show, unless just looking at the vacant first floor for first showing.

Perfect investment. Choose which flat you want to live in and have a bit of income, OR...consider this a long term investment! Such a special location and huge yard. Consider developing more apartments in the back of the house, and rent out the 40 x 40 steel frame building...OR develop into your dream workshop and let the rentals help pay for your fun. Rentals are below market for the convenience of the owner, but could be greater if you decide you need a greater profit. Please, respect the tenants with a 48 hour notice and be prepared to remove your shoes.

This beautiful Victorian home is just a short stroll from vibrant Brattleboro and has access to a huge town trail network. Nicely landscaped and has a partially fenced yard for pets or children. The house has lovely Victorian detailing and includes 3 covered porches. The formal entry has hardwood flooring, period staircase, stained glass window and a 3/4 bath. The adjacent front parlor includes oak flooring, ceiling fan and double French doors opening onto a cozy living room w/ornate fireplace w/gas stove, ceiling fan and hardwood floors. There is a formal dining room w/built-in hutch and Southern pine flooring. Then kitchen is delightful boasting elegant wainscoting, spacious center island and a walk-in pantry/mud room. The 2nd level offers a blend of comfort and style w/3 bedrooms, 2 of which share a full tiled bath. The primary bedroom is a serene retreat w/direct access to a 2nd floor covered porch, a private dressing room and an en suite tiled bath. The 3rd level unveils even more versatility with a large finished storage room that opens onto a Summer Bedroom w/colored glass windows, perfect for additional living space or creative pursuits (artist studio?). This charming home celebrates period Victorian features and a sense of elegance. There is a 2-Car garage, central air conditioning and the residence is located in a highly sought after neighborhood. A special spot offering comfort, beauty and a unique sense of place. Delayed showings 4/28/25.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: 4 condo units being sold together as a great residential package investment opportunity! Rent them, live in one and/or sell them off individually. This offering includes 4 of 5 units in a charming condo development just minutes from downtown, the hospital, shopping, and I-91. Unit 5 has been sold. The property features a large shared yard, off-street parking, and strong rental potential. The owner currently receives approximately $7, 000/month in rental income. Additionally, the town has indicated the lot could support the construction of another house, offering even more upside. All units are fully furnished and currently rented, except one mid-renovation. Unit 1 is a spacious 2BR/1BA with a walk-in pantry, washer/dryer, mudroom, oil heat, and private side porch. Unit 2 is a cozy 1BR+ with a walk-in pantry, electric heat, and small porch. Unit 3, currently under renovation, is a large 2BR with gas heat, generous living room, and private front porchready for finishing touches. Unit 4 is an updated 1BR/1BA in excellent condition with charming period details. All units feature classic touches like clawfoot tubs and porches. A unique opportunity to own a versatile, income-producing property with potential for future development.

A touch of class at Morningside Commons! This condo exudes comfort and style from the flowering trees in front through the tasteful interior to the shaded patio in the rear. Updated features include laminate floors, newer carpeting on the stairs, newer cabinetry, ceiling fans in the kitchen and master bedroom, and blinds on all the windows. The community pool and tennis/pickleball courts are only steps away. The little libraries and community gardens offer further attributes along with the welcoming feeling of community. Delayed showings begin Sunday 5/18/25.
broker_name: Better Homes & Gardens The Masiello Group
office_name: Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group

text: This light, airy, two-story, 3-bedroom house was built during the Civil War, around 1864. On .35 acres, there are planted gardens, lawn, and a large, sunny area that can be a good-sized vegetable garden. The house has a large kitchen area w/ a small wood-burning stove, a living room, dining room, a ground-floor WC and study. A screened three-season porch has been added to the house and is a pleasant area for relaxing in the evening. Upstairs there are two bedrooms & a spacious bathroom with claw-foot tub & shower; there is a walk-in attic just off the bathroom. Full basement with concrete floor, and attached garden shed. Upgrades to the house include extensive roof work; complete electrical rewiring; addition of the shower and the three-season porch; a heat pump unit w/ two mini-splits and the possibility of adding a third; cellulose insulation under the peaked roof; replacement of the hot water boiler and heating oil tank; and tree work. If you're looking for a home in a welcoming and friendly neighborhood, close to the hospital, schools and downtown, come have a look! Delayed showings until Saturday 4/19 with Open House 11am-1pm.
office_name: BERKLEY and VELLER GREENWOOD COUNTRY REALTORS

text: AVAILABLE JUNE 15TH, newly renovated building, on site coin laundry, storage units, off street parking and the building has an elevator. This unit is on the second floor and has bright sun lit rooms.

Newly renovated third floor studio apartment with a large window with in-town views. Access to everything you need within a few blocks. Enjoy the downtown scene with restaurants and breweries right on the same block. This one room apartment has its own washer and dryer in the unit. Pictures are virtually staged, apartment is not furnished.

Two bedroom apartment for rent in a professionally managed apartment building in West Brattleboro, Vermont. Clean, bright, with on-site laundry and off-street parking. Rents include heat and hot water. All units are non smoking. Small pets would require approval and an additional security deposit. To apply, visit TurboTenant and search for Property ID 1510775

Newly Renovated apartment. Located on the 3rd floor of 114 Main Street, this apartment has its own washer and dryer in the unit. Heat is included and pets are welcome. A nice big window with views of downtown allows so much sunlight into the space. Dedicated free parking can be used at the 215 Main Street tenant parking lot.

Deluxe Two-Bedroom Corner-Unit Apartment (1, 121 sq. ft.) available in the historic Brooks House where all the units have been totally renovated for comfort, efficiency and accessibility. In the heart of downtown Brattleboro, Brooks House offers dining, entertainment, shopping, and community events right outside your door. The third-floor corner-unit apartment features: Hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops High-end finishes Expansive windows and View In-Unit Washer and Dryer Residents-only Rooftop Terrace Gym Water source heat pumps provide high efficiency heating and cooling systems. Energy efficient lighting, appliances and equipment reduce energy consumption. Elevator in building First-month rent and Security Deposit required at lease signing. Screening for all applicants 12-month leases.

Outstanding Investment Opportunity Near Downtown Brattleboro. Just minutes from the vibrant Brattleboro town center, this versatile two-unit property offers unmatched convenience and strong potential for investors or owner-occupants alike. Enjoy close proximity to shopping, dining, and professional services, as well as Brattleboro Memorial Hospital, local schools, and several parks for year-round outdoor recreation. Each spacious apartment is designed for comfortable living and features private entrances for added privacy, two bedrooms, an eat-in kitchen ideal for everyday meals or entertaining, convenient laundry hookups, and inviting porches that create a welcoming entry and a relaxing outdoor space. Each unit also includes two additional light-filled living areas that offer flexible use as a home office, guest quarters, studio, or hobby room, meeting a wide variety of modern lifestyle needs. Whether you're looking to live in one unit and rent out the other to offset your mortgage or fully lease both units for steady passive income, this property delivers strong rental appeal in a high-demand location. Enjoy the convenience of a roomy driveway that easily fits several cars. With solid bones, classic New England charm, and endless possibilities, this duplex presents a rare chance to build equity and grow your real estate portfolio in one of Vermont's most creative communities.

The laundry area is also located on this level for your convenience. Bonus perk: The Vermont Country Deli is just across the street! Located near a local park with quick access to the hospital, highways, and shopping, this home is truly a hidden gem. Delayed showings begin Saturday 5/3 with an OPEN HOUSE 11am - 2pm.

text: Remodeled adorable Cape in a very sweet neighborhood! Since 2022 the current owner has made so many impressive improvements. The new kitchen is bight and contemporary. Tastefully done with new counter-tops, cabinets, flooring, sink and appliances. The dining room has new floors, paint and a propane heater that opens to the deck and a level yard. The labor of love continues throughout the first floor. The living room is bright with southeast light, 2 bedrooms and lovely bath with new windows and paint throughout. Upstairs is a versatile space, another large bedroom or office and certainly enough space for a potential bath. Besides the new windows there is an abundance of storage. There is a detached one car garage and a new 2024 roof. You cannot beat this quiet, convenient location. Showings start Friday, May 2nd by appointment.

Offers due by Monday 4/28 at 3:00 Looking for an affordable home within walking distance to downtown Brattleboro? Come see this 8 room, 3+ bed, 2 full bath home. The 2nd floor has been updated with beautiful refinished floors, recent paint, updated bath and walkup attic with spray foam insulation. The 1st floor needs updates and repairs, but could shine as nicely as the 2nd floor! Replacement windows in all but 4 windows. Picture yourself sitting on the front porch with your favorite beverage of choice! Parking for 2 cars tandem. Private road, no on-street parking. Close to highways and shopping!

Welcome Home! This move-in-ready gem is a delight, full of character and charm with modern conveniences. As you step inside, you'll find a home bathed in natural sunlight, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The open kitchen and dining area are perfect for entertaining, and the new sliding door opens onto the large back deck, where you can enjoy the spacious, level yardideal for gardening with southern exposure. The first floor also features a convenient half-bath, a versatile bedroom or office, and a classy living room with a cozy fireplace. Upstairs, you'll find the serene primary bedroom with a unique walk-through office space, another spacious bedroom, and a full bathroom complete with a jetted tub and step-in showeryour personal oasis. Recent updates include a new furnace, electric panel, and mini-splits, providing comfort and peace of mind for years to come. The paved driveway and low-maintenance vinyl siding make upkeep a breeze. Conveniently located near public transportation, shopping, I-91, the Farmers Market, and so much more. If you love hitting the slopes, Mount Snow is just about a 25-minute drive, and downtown Brattleboro is less than a few miles away. This home truly has it allschedule your personal showing today!

This 6-unit fully-leased and cashflowing property is in great condition. With gross rents of $66, 000, expenses (including property taxes) of $14, 538, and net income of $51, 462, this investment property shows a 12.1% cap rate. With stable, long-term tenants on annual leases and fully-separated utilities in 5 of the 6 units, just about everything is taken care of. Built in 1970, the property is modern and easy to maintain. Two spacious 2-bedroom units feature charming hardwood floors, while two 1-bedrooms include beautiful large picture windows and recently-installed mini splits, and two top-floor studios offer a full range of apartment options. Located just minutes away from downtown Brattleboro and all that it has to offer, where rental demand is sky-high, the property hasn't had a vacancy in years. A spacious lot allows for off-street parking for all six tenants, and nearby attractions include hiking trails, the Brattleboro farmers market, and the ski hill. Recent upgrades to the property include new propane furnaces and hot water heaters, insulation and stucco, and new bath fans and vents. At a 12% cap rate with low rents and the potential to add easily installed coin-op laundry in the common area for additional income, this would be fantastic for any investor. Nice turn key building that doesn't need anything to start earning money. See it today.

text: This light, airy, two-story, 3-bedroom house was built during the Civil War, around 1864. On .35 acres, there are planted gardens, lawn, and a large, sunny area that can be a good-sized vegetable garden. The house has a large kitchen area w/ a small wood-burning stove, a living room, dining room, a ground-floor WC and study. A screened three-season porch has been added to the house and is a pleasant area for relaxing in the evening. Upstairs there are two bedrooms & a spacious bathroom with claw-foot tub & shower; there is a walk-in attic just off the bathroom. Full basement with concrete floor, and attached garden shed. Upgrades to the house include extensive roof work; complete electrical rewiring; addition of the shower and the three-season porch; a heat pump unit w/ two mini-splits and the possibility of adding a third; cellulose insulation under the peaked roof; replacement of the hot water boiler and heating oil tank; and tree work. If you're looking for a home in a welcoming and friendly neighborhood, close to the hospital, schools and downtown, come have a look! Delayed showings until Saturday 4/19 with Open House 11am-1pm.

text: This single wide has so many added benefits! You can heat entirely with wood should you choose, there's an entryway and a huge heated mudroom, with direct access to the expansive back yard. The corner lot overlooks neighboring grassy fields for additional privacy. This yard has raised beds and over 200 bulbs planted! Being sold with a solar generator that powers the owners' home office. Contingent upon sellers finding suitable housing. You must be 55 or older to live in this Park and Buyer must be Park approved. Ideal closing date would be June 1st. High cash flow well maintained 4plex located in quaint Brattleboro neighborhood within proximity to the vibrant downtown, listed at a deep-value 11% cap rate. This 100% occupied building has 2x 2br and 2x1br, and a net operating income of ~38K with significant upside based on rents over 20% below market. A new owner can step into to yield over a 15% cash on cash return starting year 1, and build wealth through high cash-flow vs speculation. Rents can be brought to market to achieve north of a 25% cash on cash (see proforma in OM). In addition to enjoying the tremendous cash flow, there is also significant upside to acquire a high quality stabilized 4plex with value-add from growing rents to market, ahead of the investment and resurgence going on in vibrant and desirable Brattleboro. The property is available as a package with other buildings in Brattleboro and in nearby towns for a buyer looking for a larger high cash flow turnkey multifamily portfolio. Listing Broker is a member of the LLC selling the property.
